Description: U/G LV Mains Repair (Other) In Progress
In Progress

There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh, affecting properties in Sinclair Street and surrounding Streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.10pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to restore supplies following extensive damage to the Sinclair Street substation affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:46pm on Wednesday, 28 April 2021

Description: There is an unplanned power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Laurieston affecting properties in Old Redding Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site and, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15pm this is to safely complete the final repair on an underground cable fault. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.47pm on Wednesday 28th April 2021.
